getMailNum ( $  element_name,
$  username 
)

The getMailNum() function counts the number of mails in different boxes (inbox,sent,drafts,trash)

param $element = element name (the box being checked) param $username = email address to be searched

global $link = the database link handle created by the inc_db_makelink.php include global $dbtable = the table for the mailboxes

return = number of mails in the box
